item.title: Builders dumped waste in our recycling bin, 27th September

item.title: Untaxed recorded as sorn on DVLA . False number plates, 27th September
item.description:
This vehicle has been dumped here by tow 26/09/2025. DVLA have the vehicle as a Peugeot car (silver ) not the vehicle shown in pictures. False number plates. This is a residential parking cul-de-sac and this large vehicle was towed and has just been left here. It restricts residential parking provision

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Groombridge Close, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Partially Blocked Footpath, 27th September
item.description:

item.title: Double bed base and mattresses flytipped, 27th September
item.description:
Double bed base, a double mattress and some carpet on the pavement by the telephone cable box near number 27. Single mattress flytipped a few metres up. All appeared about two days ago. There's regular flytipping in that spot. Please can they be removed. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakfield Road, Anerley, London
